project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Implement a real-time text chat feature allowing users to send and receive messages instantly.
acceptance_criteria: Messages sent by a user appear in the recipient's chat window within 1 second.
Chat history is preserved and retrievable for each conversation.
Supports sending text, emojis, and basic file attachments.
non_functional: Latency under 1 second for message delivery

items.title: Video Calling
items.description: Enable one-to-one and group video calls with real-time audio and video streaming.
acceptance_criteria: Users can initiate and receive video calls from their contact list.
Video and audio streams maintain synchronization with less than 300ms delay.
Supports at least 4 participants in a group video call.

notes: Assumed the application will support both web and mobile platforms; group video call participant limit is an initial assumption and may need adjustment based on performance testing.
